description:
Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users.

Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users.
It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new movies and will interface with clients and indexers to grab, sort, and rename them.
It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of existing files in the library when a better quality format becomes available.
Note that only one type of a given movie is supported.
If you want both an 4k version and 1080p version of a given movie you will need multiple instances.
Changes:
- Fixed: Increase rate limit for PassThePopcorn
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- New: Add Tagalog language
- New: Add Marathi language
- Fixed: Sending Manual Interaction Required notifications to Discord for unknown movies
- Check if backup folder is writable on backup [ #10806 ]
- Suggest adding IP to RPC whitelist for on failed Transmission auth
- Bump version to 5.17.2
- Don't send session information to Sentry
- Fixed: Advanced settings for Metadata consumers
- Fixed: Movies updated during Import List Sync not reflected in the UI [ #10794 ]
- Bump version to 5.17.1
- Bump System.Memory [ #10791 ]
- Bump MailKit to 4.8.0 and Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.7 [ #10790 ]
- Add test for do not prefer repacks/propers
- Fixed: Custom Format score bypassing upgrades not being allowed
- Convert MediaInfo to TypeScript [ #10753 ]
- Upgrade @typescript-eslint packages to 8.181.1
- Upgrade Font Awesome to 6.7.1
- Upgrade babel to 7.26.0
- Bump version to 5.17.0
